thought: I need to craft green_stained_glass. I have 8 glass blocks and 1 green_dye. To craft green_stained_glass, I need to place 1 green_dye in the middle of 8 glass blocks. I will start by moving the first glass block into the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1
